contents.text: Thank you for calling Capgemini San Francisco, a global leader in consulting, technology services and digital transformation.
For information on our consulting and digital solutions, press '1' to choose that menu.
To explore our cloud and platform services, press '1' to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to our cloud and platform specialist.

navigationGoals: I need pricing and options for migrating our applications to Capgemini’s cloud platform.
I want to speak with a cloud specialist about building scalable infrastructure for my veteran support nonprofit
I need to discuss multi-cloud deployment strategies using Kubernetes and Terraform.
I’m not very tech-savvy; can someone guide me through setting up and migrating my files to a cloud platform?
Ask about accessing cloud computing and platform services for my computational physics research as a student

contents.text: To learn about our digital transformation offerings, press '2' to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to a digital transformation expert.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss a digital transformation strategy for our department.
I want to explore digital transformation solutions to modernize workflows at my veteran outreach program
I want to explore AI-driven process automation and RPA implementation for our finance workflows.
I need help understanding how to digitize my paper medical records and automate my home business processes.
Learn about digital transformation solutions for modernizing university research labs

contents.text: To speak with a Capgemini team member, press '2' to choose that menu.
For general consulting inquiries, press '1' to choose that menu.
Please hold while we transfer you to a general consulting representative.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for general consulting to optimize our operational workflows.
I need general consulting advice on optimizing operations for my veteran-run organization
I need strategic IT consulting on enterprise architecture and digital roadmap alignment.
I’d like general advice on which consulting services can help streamline my small business operations.
Discuss internship or collaboration opportunities in physics-related consulting

contents.text: For technical support, press '2' to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need immediate technical support for an ongoing system outage.
I need technical support accessing my training portal for veteran career development
I need help troubleshooting OAuth2 authentication failures in our microservices API gateway.
I’m having trouble logging into my account; can technical support help me fix this?
Obtain technical assistance to troubleshoot login issues on the Capgemini student portal
